info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 12 at 3:22AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Great Falls MT
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow with accumulations up to 2 inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy, wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches, heaviest along interstate 15 near Dearborn.
* WHERE...Gates of the Mountains.
* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM MDT this evening. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Monday.
* IMPACTS...Roads may become snow packed and slippery, especially tonight and Monday morning. The heavy, wet snow may cause power outages and or tree damage.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most impactful snow is expected tonight and Monday morning.
info.instruction:
Remember, a Winter Storm Warning means that there is at least an 80% chance of impactful winter weather conditions during the warning period.
Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

parameter.value: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT MONDAY
